books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross returns to Starksville, N.C., his hometown, for the first time in 35 years, to help a cousin who has been accused of murder.
books.name: CROSS JUSTICE

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum pursues a fraternity member arrested for beating up a college dean and investigates a murder.
books.name: TRICKY TWENTY-TWO

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hit man Will Robie investigates murder charges against his estranged father in their Mississippi hometown.
books.name: THE GUILTY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A couple in love are threatened by secrets from the past.
books.name: SEE ME

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch reluctantly helps his half brother, a defense attorney, and his investigations lead him inside the L.A.P.D.
books.name: THE CROSSING

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Twenty stories, some never before published.
books.name: THE BAZAAR OF BAD DREAMS

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: After an intruder's murder, Siena's motives are called into question.
books.name: WILD CAT

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Three couples pool their powers in their search for the prophetic fire star.
books.name: STARS OF FORTUNE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Philip K. Dick
books.description: An alternative history of 1960s America, after it lost World War II. First published in 1962; the basis of the TV series.
books.name: THE MAN IN THE HIGH CASTLE

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A preternaturally gifted guitarist uses his talent to alter lives.
books.name: THE MAGIC STRINGS OF FRANKIE PRESTO

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark and Alafair Burke
books.description: A TV producer investigates a bride’s disappearance for her show, “Under Suspicion.”
books.name: ALL DRESSED IN WHITE
